message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I want to assure you that I'm a reliable seller, and I've sold many products to customers who are satisfied with their purchases. I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not completely satisfied with the product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll find the product to be a great value.
Thank you for your offer and the assurance. I appreciate the 30-day money-back guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance on the previous product! Unfortunately, this next product is also not as good as I'd like to admit. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've been having some quality control issues lately, and I'm working to address them. I'm offering this product to you at the same price as before, but I want to make it clear that I'm not confident in its quality. If you're willing to take another chance, I'll include a small gift with your purchase, a $20 voucher that you can use on your next purchase from me.
I appreciate your transparency and the effort to improve quality control. However, given the history, I think it's best for me to pass on this product and look for other options.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I appreciate your honesty. This next product is also not up to my usual standards, and I'm starting to think I should have been more upfront about the quality issues earlier. To be honest, I'm starting to wonder if I should be selling at all, given the risk of disappointing customers. But, I'm willing to make one more offer to you, and I'll throw in a $40 voucher, which is more than double the value of the previous one. This is my last low-quality product, and I'm willing to take a loss on it to get it off my hands. Will you consider taking it off my hands for $100?

I appreciate your honesty and the additional voucher. However, given the consistent quality issues, I think it's best for both of us if I pass on this product. Thank you for considering my needs, and I hope you can resolve the quality issues soon.

I think this is a great opportunity for you to experience the quality you deserve, and I'm excited to hear your thoughts.
